name: Chibi Geedi
description:
Chibi Gidi

Chibi Gidi is what would happen if competitive dodgeball married an anime and had a baby, but the baby lived in your pocket on gameboy. Inspired by the legendary Penguin Attack, Chibi Gidi features familiar GD01 All Stars like Ting, Ruslan and even Scott Morin, but anime styles!

Controls  

Left and Right to Move

Space to Pick Up and Throw

Start to.. Start! 

Programmer- Ting Wen

(Coded Gameplay, Built Game Manager, Score System, Enemy AI, Player Controls)

Designer and Project Manager- Alex Dault

(Designed GDD, Built Animations, Music and SFX, added in Sound and SFX)

Art- Ruslan Makarov

(Designed Backgrounds and Arena and Title Screens, Music and SFX, Colouration of Characters, VS Screen Art)

Art- Ziming "Barry" Ma

(Concept Art, Character and Enemy Art and Frames, Title Screen)
